full_summary:
Imagine a high-resolution digital microscope system that can assist in scientific research. This announcement seeks qualified contractors to provide a portable digital microscope system to support further development of vegetation mapping and monitoring capabilities.

**Electronic Tender Notice # PR4797 23376-230401**
* Solicitation Number: WS3816679040
* Language: English
* Publication Date: January 31, 2023
* Closing Date and Time: February 22, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Equipment Specifications**
The successful bidder must provide a portable, high-resolution digital microscope system that includes:

* All hardware and software requirements specified in the Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Documentation and virtual training
* A one-year warranty, including maintenance and support services

**Notice Details**
This tender was previously announced under PR4797 23376-230401, becoming amended after February 15, 2023. The closing time for this tender has changed.

**Supplier Suppliers and Bidding Process**
The Federal Government will adopt a competitive and selective bidding process. Bidders need to submit their complete proposals, including all requested information, by the closing time. 

**Trade Agreements**
The Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and the Trade Agreements (Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement and Canadian Free Trade Agreement) apply.

**Territorial Region of Delivery**
Delivery shall be made to the National Capital Region (NCR), in Ottawa, Canada.

**Bid Evaluation**
A technical evaluation is involved in the tender process.

Bidders must have access to the Discovery Portal. For further information and reference, kindly contact Daniel Soucy (contracting officer) at daniel.soucy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for bid details and information requests only.

**Registration Link**
The notice can also be found on the bid/advertisement(s) link: [insert url here]. )

Bidders with questions must email Daniel Soucy (contracting officer) at daniel.soucy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca by the closing time.
